item.title: [317]delta based- pkpoint shop sells items for pk points/pk points dont decrease
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

yes this is demise, and no char file doesnt null its just the pk shop when you buy items your pk points dont decrease they just keep at what it is at, because its a spawn server

example:
say you got 100 kills for dragon claws

you go to shop and you can buy as many dragon claws as possible as long as ur 100+ kills
your kills dont decrease.
